Header.title: Welcome to SportLinker
Header.paragraph: Connect with fellow sports enthusiasts and find your perfect match for athletic activities.

About.paragraph: SportLinker connects sports enthusiasts, making it easy to find teammates, organize events, chat, post content, and more. Join our community and elevate your sports experience!
Why: Build a strong local sports community
Why2: Connect and interact with other users
Experience the joy of shared athleticism

Services.name: Find Sports Partners
Services.text: Easily find sports partners who share your interests and preferences.

Services.name: Build a Community
Services.text: Build a strong local sports community and participate in various athletic activities.

Services.name: Schedule Events
Services.text: Effortlessly organize athletic events and activities, and connect with other participants.

Services.name: Feedback & Reviews
Services.text: Receive reliable feedback and reviews from fellow sports enthusiasts.

Features.title: Find Partners
Features.text: Easily find sports partners based on your preferences and location.

Features.title: Schedule Events
Features.text: Effortlessly schedule and organize athletic events with other users.

Features.title: Chat & Connect
Features.text: Connect and chat with other users to discuss sports plans and activities.

Features.title: Feedback & Reviews
Features.text: Provide and receive feedback and reviews to build a positive sports community.
